summary: Simple Solitaire web page/app with centered card layout

existing_features.title: Update the top header title on the Solitaire page to read exactly "Simple Solitaire" and leave all other existing text unchanged.

Center the card layout (top row: stock/waste/foundations; and tableau row) horizontally within the page across responsive breakpoints, without breaking drag-and-drop interactions or causing horizontal overflow on typical viewport widths.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update the top title text to read "Simple Solitaire" while keeping all other text unchanged
Center the cards on the web page without causing layout/responsiveness issues
